transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, yeah Amit Vijay from Venus Industrial Services.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan Vijay ji kaise hain aap? Main Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Main Noida head office se baat kar rahi hu. Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Haan, theek hu boliye.
Executive: Haan ji. Sir ye aap koi service running hai IndiaMART se.
Executive: TrustSeal teen saal se, right sir? Toh 2021 se aap hamare saath hain. Aapne starting mein ye DC karaya.
Executive: Aur phir isko 2022 mein aapne TrustSeal teen saal ka package liya sir humse.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na? Toh sir aapko hopefully kuch acche conversions mile honge TrustSeal teen saal se matlab jab aapne karaya hoga toh uska paisa aapne recover kar liya hai na sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Sir abhi next kya plan hai? Kyunki abhi dekhiye renewal bhi aaya hua hai sir ye.
Customer: Mere accounts manager hai Praveen karke hai.
Executive: Haan ji. Pata hi hoga. Unse baat kar lijiye na. Discussion hua unse jo bhi ho.
Executive: Sir Praveen ne mujhe bataya ki aap na ye discount ke liye bol rahe hain.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Hello, haan ji, discount. Aur sir matlab, matlab unhone aapko teen saal ka 84,000 plus GST commit kiya hai ki hum last itne mein kar sakte hain. 84 plus GST but you are saying that usko 70 plus GST karwa dijiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Right? Uh,
Executive: Sir dekhiye already agar aap dekhe toh 1 lakh ka price hai iska apna. Nahi woh sab ho gaya discussion. Abhi sirf hai na? To abhi agar karna hai ki nahi karna hai.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh sir aap mujhe bataye ki dekhiye ye toh last amount hai sir aur 1 lakh ke against mein maine aapko
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Nahi theek hai phir abhi kya iske aage kya baat kare phir? Khatam ho gaya na matter.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir baat woh nahi hai ki kya aage baat kare. Dekhiye aapne jab business kiya hi hai IndiaMART se toh usko kara de aage continue sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh sab ho chuka hai madam baat. Woh sab karke koi fayda hai nahi. Utna time bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aisa nahi hai. Aap itne purane customer hain. Agar aapko ye nahi jam raha hai toh aapko toh do saal ya ek saal mein kara lijiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Agar aapko ye amount bahut zyada lag raha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Nahi theek hai. Toh do saal ya ek saal mein kara lijiye sir.
Customer: Nahi woh bol chuka na main unko ek baar nahi karana hai mujhe ek do saal ka. Agar karaunga toh wohi karaunga ya nahi karaunga.
Executive: Toh sir dekho price toh main toh khud hi dekhiye yahi price aapne hame pichle teen saal pehle diya tha. Bataye sir teen saal mein kya nahi badla aap bataye. Aapne same amount hame 84 ke lagbhag hi pichle saal diya tha, teen saal pehle sir. Sir wohi toh aap se demand ki hai maine. Kya sir?
Customer: Haan theek hai na boliye na.
Executive: Haan. Toh sir aap mujhe bataye sir main matlab itna zyada toh aap se demand hi nahi kar rahe na sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aap matlab aapki kya expectation hai?
Customer: Woh bol diya na 70 usko bola tha nahi karana hai khatam ho gaya matter. Ab ho sakta hai ki nahi ho sakta hai utna batana hai. Khatam hai na kya faltu mein woh phir discussion karenge. Woh toh ho chuka hai baat.
Executive: Sir aap ek cheez bataye teen saal mein kaha hike hui hai? Kis cheez pe hike hui hai? Sir 2022 se aap 2025 aa gaya. Aap keh rahe ho aur kam kar do sir. Toh bataye na sir ek hum 15% har saal badhta hai aap keh rahe ho aur gira do usko. Sir business mein aisa kaha hota hai?
Customer: Ji.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir ji main keh rahi hu isko karwa dijiye otherwise ye catalog band ho jayega sir aapka.
Customer: Hmm nahi theek hai na madam band hi karana hai mujhe.
Executive: Are you sure band karana hai sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai toh sir jo bhi aapka data hai aap ek baar save kar lijiye phir main band hi kara deti hu isko.
Customer: Nahi toh usme kya data chahiye? Kuch nahi usme.
Executive: Matlab isme buyer ka details hoti hain aapki aap access nahi kar paoge aap.
Customer: Nahi nahi koi nahi woh usko usme kuch nahi hai kuch char saal mein kuch nahi hua hai.
Executive: Sir aapne toh bola tha na business aa raha hai theek chal raha hai. Abhi maine sabse pehle aap se feedback bhi pucha. Aapne mujhe positive feedback diya tabhi maine aap se renewal.
Customer: Haan toh main mujhe zyada discuss nahi karna hai na isliye main sirf haan bola.
Executive: No problem sir waise koi matlab business mein itna purana firm band nahi karata hai sir. Char saal se aap hamare saath hain. Uski koi eligibility bhi aap dekho toh aap top results mein aate hain IndiaMART sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aap band kara rahe hain sir isko?
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: No problem sir main isko band kara deti hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a discount on TrustSeal renewal.

- Customer wants to close the catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the pricing structure.

- Executive agreed to close the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Catalog will be closed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, renewal, discount, catalog, closing
